img_above_text:
![Wukong Mindcliff 10.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/1/11/Wukong_Mindcliff_10.jpg)
It might not look like it, but you can actually fall down a ledge below this spot, and you can then spy a trail of ledges leading down to a fallen pillar with another green Wisp along the middle, meaning you can actually cross it!
img_below_text:
Once you cross the giant pit by way of the fallen pillar, take out the Monk Supporter on the other side, and work your way up the path. Another Monk Supporter can be found on the higher path leading out of a cave and back outside, but beware of a Cyan Bat lurking above.
![Wukong Mindcliff 12.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/4/4a/Wukong_Mindcliff_12.jpg)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 11 from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Wukong Mindcliff 10.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/1/11/Wukong_Mindcliff_10.jpg)
It might not look like it, but you can actually fall down a ledge below this spot, and you can then spy a trail of ledges leading down to a fallen pillar with another green Wisp along the middle, meaning you can actually cross it!"
            - Following Text: "Once you cross the giant pit by way of the fallen pillar, take out the Monk Supporter on the other side, and work your way up the path. Another Monk Supporter can be found on the higher path leading out of a cave and back outside, but beware of a Cyan Bat lurking above.
![Wukong Mindcliff 12.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/4/4a/Wukong_Mindcliff_12.jpg)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," showing the protagonist, Wukong, in a dark cave environment. Wukong is poised for combat, holding a staff, with a Monk Supporter enemy ahead and a large shadowy figure in the background. This scene follows a challenging traversal across a fallen pillar and precedes an encounter with another Monk Supporter and a Cyan Bat. The image highlights the game's atmospheric setting and the imminent combat scenarios players will face.
